titles.title: For the relief of Charmaine Bieda.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 5/14/1997--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual in full satisfaction of all claims against the United States relating to the murder of her daughter by her daughter's husband while both husband and wife were serving in the U.S. Army and after the daughter had requested the Army to protect her from her husband's abuse.
